1. Background knowledge/information regarding the available deployment options (see section 6.2.10), mechanisms, techniques and implementation requirements, including: software tools, hardware and expertise as well as other necessary information regarding the model inputs, parameters and expected outputs, as well as the constraints of their application.
2. The aims of the metabolomics study and its investigation goals,  hypotheses,  and assumptions.
3. The defined process objectives
4. The justification of data mining technique selection.
5. The acclimatised data.
6. The data mining model.
7. The model evaluation report.
8. The presented knowledge.
9. Knowledge evaluation.
10.The process standards.
